Terrorism Risk Insurance Program Reauthorization Act of 2019
A bill to reauthorize the Terrorism Risk Insurance Act of 2002, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

calendar.text: Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs. Reported by Senator Crapo without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 313.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary:
Terrorism Risk Insurance Program Reauthorization Act of 2019
This bill reauthorizes through 2027 the Terrorism Risk Insurance Program within the Department of the Treasury. The Government Accountability Office must report on insurance coverage of cyberterrorism.
